name: immich
description: Immich is a self hosted photo and video backup solution for mobile and desktop. It offers automatic uploads, face recognition, maps, albums and multi user support, providing a private alternative to big cloud photo services.

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Automatic mobile uploads, Background sync, Original quality preservation. Never lose a memory

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: AI-powered face detection, Person grouping, Smart search. Find people instantly

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Shared albums, Collaborative collections, Privacy controls. Organize beautifully

features.title: Search
features.description: AI-powered object detection, Location search, Date filtering. Find anything fast

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Family sharing, User permissions, Separate libraries. Perfect for households

features.title: Mobile Apps
features.description: iOS and Android, Native performance, Offline viewing. Access everywhere

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Video uploads, Transcoding, Streaming playback. Full media library
